thread.title: Families mark fourth anniversary of Malaysia Airlines flight MH370's disappearance

title: Families mark fourth anniversary of Malaysia Airlines flight MH370's disappearance
text:
Families mark fourth anniversary of Malaysia Airlines flight MH370's disappearance 1:38pm GMT - 00:47 
Family members of passengers onboard missing flight MH370 gather in Kuala Lumpur to remember their loved ones on the fourth anniversary of the plane's disappearance. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Family members of passengers onboard missing flight MH370 gather in Kuala Lumpur to remember their loved ones on the fourth anniversary of the plane's disappearance.
